thread.title: Andy Reid laughed as he called a touchdown before the ball was snapped in the Pro Bowl
thread.title_full: Andy Reid laughed as he called a touchdown before the ball was snapped in the Pro Bowl

author: nick pants
title: Andy Reid laughed as he called a touchdown before the ball was snapped in the Pro Bowl
text:
Shoot your shot, Andy!
The next time someone tells you that the Pro Bowl is boring and that nothing ever happens, show them of this.
That’s Andy Reid calling a touchdown to put the AFC up 7-0 over the NFC. He called four verticals and Alex Smith through an absolutely beautiful 26-yard pass to Delanie Walker in the corner of the end zone.
Now if only Andy would call another ‘Bloated Tim Tebow’ play.
